install.description: With the help of a NavTV RGB converter we were able to integrate a video signal from a DVD Player and back-up camera into the factory navigation screen.
For easy access we mounted the Accele DVD player / TV tuner under the glove box. An 110V outlet as well as AUX A/V inputs was added as well.
A K-40 2000 front and rear radar detector with a LD 5500 laser diffuser was installed as well, with the warning LED's integrated into the instrument cluster.
Vizualogic 7" headrest monitors were installed for rear seat entertainment.
The best part is, absolutely no room was sacrificed in the cargo area to accommodate this incredible stereo system.
With the cover removed you can see the grilles for the two JL Audio 10W6V2 10" subwoofers firing up.

If you flip the front part of the cover back you can see the two Phoenix Gold ti series amplifiers. The left side contains two one-farad capacitors and an exhaust fan while the right side contains all the MB Quart passive cross-overs and an in-blowing fan for proper cooling.
Flip up the back part of the new cover and you gain access to a handy storage compartment over the spare tire. You can also see the custom sub enclosures hugging the spare tire.
Lift out the storage bin and you have access to the spare and all the required tools.
A wide-angle back-up camera was added to help navigate with the limited view out of the back of this truck.
Many unique shapes where utilized in these boxes to gain enough airspace for the two 10" woofers, while retaining the spare tire.
